title: The Login Servers Did not respond.
body: I don't know if i'm the only one who is having trouble with this or not but does anyone know how to fix this? ive been waiting after half an hour or so to try and log back in again but it keeps coming up with this same message ive tried changing dns thingy ive tried some solutions but none of them have been successful can someone pls help me out? :( i really wanna play thx

replies.body: What OS are you on and who's your ISP?
